title: Casino visitors in the U.S. ordered by age group 2010
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Age of casino visitors, and Percentage of respondents in each Age of casino visitors on the y axis.
The maximum Percentage of respondents 33.0 is found at Age of casino visitors Age 50-64 and the minimum is found at Don't know / refused where Age of casino visitors is 3.0.
The difference of Percentage of respondents between the highest and lowest Age of casino visitors is 30.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Age of casino visitors in the x axis and Percentage of respondents in the y axis.
Age of casino visitors Age 50-64 has the highest Percentage of respondents and Don't know / refused has the lowest Percentage of respondents.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Age of casino visitors, and Percentage of respondents in each Age of casino visitors on the y axis.
The maximum Percentage of respondents 33.0 is found at Age of casino visitors Age 50-64 and the minimum is found at Don't know / refused where Age of casino visitors is 3.0.

max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Age of casino visitors, and Percentage of respondents in each Age of casino visitors on the y axis.
Age of casino visitors Age 50-64 has the highest Percentage of respondents and Don't know / refused has the lowest Percentage of respondents.
The highest Age of casino visitors Age 50-64 has 30.0 more Percentage of respondents than the lowest Age of casino visitors Don't know / refused.

Age of casino visitors Age 50-64 is higher than any other Age of casino visitorss with value 33.0, followed by Age 65 and over, and Age 35-49. Down to Age of casino visitors Don't know / refused with the lowest value 3.0.
The Age of casino visitors Don't know / refused has 1.65 times less Percentage of respondents than average.
